# Asynchronous Query Status Changed

# Description

Triggers when an asynchronous query execution status is changed.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

Query status - The query execution status. Select one of the
                        available options from the dropdown menu: Success, Running, Queued, Blocked,
                        Resuming warehouse, Failed with error, Failed with incident.





* Query details - Automatically generated output variable.
* Query details ID - Automatically generated output variable.
